initial_question.title: How to install after compiling with Ninja?
initial_question.body: In the [instructions](//github.com/libuv/libuv#using-ninja), you only provide how to generate and build with ninja. Actully, how do I install LibUV after building it with ninja? There is no `ninja install`.

satisfaction_conditions: User understands the appropriate build tool for their use case
Installation method aligns with project deployment needs
